errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again in a moment.
errors.internalServerError: Something went wrong. Please report the issue and try again later.
errors.serviceUnavailable: App is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.forbidden: You don't have permissions to access this resource.

errors.conflict: You have already reached the limit of alerts.

errors.notFound: This alert does not exist anymore.
This alert does not exist anymore.

error.title: Either goal or entry doesn't exist
Either goal or entry doesn't exist

errors.notFound: Couldn't find daily it could be assigned to.

errors.conflict: This account already exists. Please try to log in instead.
errors.badRequest: Account information provided by external provider had expired. Try logging in again.
errors.unauthorized: Account information provided by external provider is incomplete. Please try again later or report this issue.

disable.notFound: 2FA integration does not found, try again later.
disable.conflict: At least one 2FA integration must be enabled.

errors.notFound: 2FA integration does not found, try again later.

errors.unauthorized: We couldn't log you out. You can force logout by clearing app cookies.

errors.notFound: Activation token is not valid. Please request a new one.
Password change token is not valid. Please request a new one.

loading.title: Loading...
loading.caption: Please be patient. If loading is taking too long, try different filters.

noData.title: No entries found
noData.caption: Add new entries or change filters.

notEnoughData.caption: For most basic metrics we require at least few logged entries to provide any meaningful insights. The more entries you log, the more insights will appear here.

summary.caption: The more data you collect, the more meaningful insights will appear here. Keep logging your entries, and we will deliver!

score.title: Score
score.description: Based on metrics gathered from your activity.

completed_entries_ratio.too_low: Remember to mark your entries as completed. Starting new things is good, but finishing them is even better!
completed_entries_ratio.slightly_too_low: Your completed entries ratio is still quite low. Focus on completing entries before starting new ones!
completed_entries_ratio.slightly_below_optimal: You have a decent ratio of completed entries.
completed_entries_ratio.optimal: You complete most of your entries. Great job!

featured_entries_ratio.too_low: Remember to feature your entries; it will make it easier to focus on the most important parts of your work!
featured_entries_ratio.slightly_too_low: You've featured some entries, but you still don't use this feature often enough.
featured_entries_ratio.slightly_below_optimal: It's a good start, but you could feature your entries a bit more often.
featured_entries_ratio.optimal: Your featured entries ratio is perfectly balanced.
featured_entries_ratio.slightly_too_high: You feature a few too many entries. Try to focus on the most important priorities.
featured_entries_ratio.too_high: You're featuring too many entries. Remember, if everything is important, nothing is.

current_streak.too_low: You don't have an active streak right now. Log an entry today to start one!
current_streak.slightly_too_low: You logged an entry today, starting a new streak! Keep it up tomorrow.
current_streak.slightly_below_optimal: You have an active streak of a few days. Can you keep the streak going?
current_streak.optimal: You have a long active streak going. Fantastic consistency!

active_day_rate.too_low: You have entries assigned to only a few days in this period. Remember to add entries to each of your work day.
active_day_rate.slightly_too_low: Your daily activity coverage is a bit low. Remember to add entries to each of your work day.
active_day_rate.slightly_below_optimal: You're assigning entries consistently on many days. Keep it up!
active_day_rate.optimal: You have entries assigned to most days, showing great consistency.

featuredEntriesRatio.title: Featured entries
featuredEntriesRatio.description: How many entries have been featured, expressed in percentage.

completedEntriesRatio.title: Completed entries
completedEntriesRatio.description: How many entries have been completed, expressed in percentage.

activeDayRate.title: Active day rate
activeDayRate.description: How many days have at least one logged entry, expressed in percentage.

pendingEntriesAmount.title: Pending entries
pendingEntriesAmount.description: Number of entries that are yet to be completed.

completedEntriesAmount.title: Completed entries
completedEntriesAmount.description: Number of entries you have marked as completed.

featuredEntriesAmount.title: Featured entries
featuredEntriesAmount.description: Number of entries you have marked as important.

totalEntriesAmount.title: All entries
totalEntriesAmount.description: Total number of entries you have created.

longestStreak.title: Longest streak
longestStreak.description: Highest number of consecutive days with at least one entry.

currentStreak.title: Current streak
currentStreak.description: Number of consecutive days with at least one entry (ongoing).

meanActivityPerDay.title: Mean activity
meanActivityPerDay.description: Average number of entries logged per day.

totalActiveDays.title: Active days
totalActiveDays.description: Total number of days with at least one entry.

entriesAccumulatedByDays.title: Cumulative entries by assigned day
entriesAccumulatedByDays.label: Entries
entriesAccumulatedByDays.description: Tracks the cumulative number of entries based on the day they are assigned to.

entryLoggingDistributionGranular.title: Entry creation time distribution
entryLoggingDistributionGranular.label: Entries created
entryLoggingDistributionGranular.description: Shows at what times new entries are typically created.

entriesLoggedForDay.title: Entries assigned by day of week
entriesLoggedForDay.label: Entries assigned
entriesLoggedForDay.description: Shows the distribution of entries based on the day of the week they are assigned to.

dailyActivityHistogram.title: Daily assignment activity histogram
dailyActivityHistogram.label: Days
dailyActivityHistogram.description: See how many days had a specific number of entries assigned to them.

empty.title: Not much to see here
empty.caption: You have not added any daily in {date} yet.

success.title: Daily has been created
success.body: It will be moved to correct timeframe once you leave this page.

success.title: Daily's date has been updated
success.body: It will be moved to correct timeframe once you leave this page.

modal.caption: Are you sure that you want to delete {date} daily? All it's entries will be deleted as well.

success.title: Daily and it's entries have been deleted

alerts.label: Alerts
alerts.description: Configure alerts, change their scheduled time, disable them, delete completely, or add new ones.

profile.label: Profile
profile.description: Manage your profile - configure two-factor authentication, update profile details or close your account.

accountTermination.description: If you want to close your account and remove your data, press the button below. You will be prompted to authorize the request, and after that, you'll be logged out. This action is irreversible.

logoutFromAllDevices.description: You will be logged out from all devices (including this one). Sessions that are still active on other devices may take up to few minutes to be invalidated.

2fa.description: Two-factor authentication is required and enabled by default; codes are sent to your email you've provided during registration. If you wish, you can enable another 2FA option, such as authenticator app (e.g. Google Authenticator). At least one 2FA option needs to be enabled; if you wish you can enable all options.

checkbox.label: I am aware of the consequences of this action.

reminders.description: Regular reminders, triggered always on the same time on the days you select. Finishing your work at 4PM? Set a reminder and we will send you an email, so you can note down your progress.

forbidden.title: You are not allowed to access this resource.

success.title: Access granted
success.body: You are now using upgraded session.

2faRequired.title: Can't disable 2FA
2faRequired.body: At least 1 method must be enabled.

email.description: Request code using button below and after a while you will receive an email with the code.

app.description: Request code using button below and after a while you will receive an email with the code.
app.warning: Until you enter valid confirmation code, each time we will generate new, unique QR code.

email.label: Email
email.description: Request code using button below and after a while you will receive an email with the code.

app.label: Authenticator app
app.description: Request code using button below and after a while you will receive an email with the code.

selection.description: You need to perform 2FA in order to access this resource. Upon successful authentication, you'll gain required permissions for limited time.

form.description: You need to create an account before signing in. Your provider will handle everything, we just need you to accept our terms and conditions.

success.body: We were able to authenticate you.
success.title: Account created

success.body: Please check your inbox to continue.
success.title: Request sent

alert.info: Please check your email to find account activation link. We always send one immediately after registration.
alert.error: We couldn't activate your account. Reason:

form.caption: Please submit your email, we will send the activation link once again. Previous one will be invalidated and won't work anymore.
form.warning: You won't receive the activation link if your account is already activated.

success.body: We were able to re-authenticate you.
success.title: Session restored

success.body: We were able to authenticate you.
success.title: Welcome back!

success.body: You can now log in with your new credentials.
success.title: Password updated

success.body: Please check your inbox to find account activation link.
success.title: Registration successful

form.caption: Enter your email, we will send you a link to update your password.

success.body: Please check your inbox to reset the password.
success.title: Request sent

hero.caption: Spark helps you track daily progress, provides insights, and creates reports you can use for talks with your manager.

actions.caption: Own account is required to use Spark features.

easyToStart.title: Easy to start
easyToStart.caption: Sign up and create your first entry in 2 minutes. Spend just 5 minutes per-day on journaling.

smartInsights.title: Smart insights
smartInsights.caption: Spark will provide insights based on your journaling habits, so you can create entries of higher quality.

openSource.title: Open-source
openSource.caption: We have nothing to hide; Spark's code is publicly available. You can also host Spark on your own.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy-first
privacyFirst.caption: Cookies are for authentication, not for tracking. We don't share your data with third parties. We never will.

goals.caption: Each entry will bring you closer to achieving your goal.

alerts.caption: Forgot about adding new entries? No worries, we will remind you.

callToAction.caption: Your progress, insights, goals and pain-points in one place.

q1.question: What is Spark?
q1.answer: Spark is a journaling application designed to help you track your progress, gain insights into your habits, and achieve your goals. It's a privacy-first, open-source platform.

q2.question: Is Spark free to use?
q2.answer: Yes, Spark is completely free to use. We believe in providing valuable tools without hidden costs.

q3.question: Can I use Spark on multiple devices?
q3.answer: Yes, your data is synced across devices, allowing you to access your journal entries, goals, and insights from anywhere.

q1.question: How do I create an account?
q1.answer: You can create an account by navigating to the 'Register' page and providing your email and a strong password, or by using one of the supported OIDC providers like Google.

q2.question: What if I forget my password?
q2.answer: You can reset your password by clicking on 'Forgot password?' on the login page. We will send a password reset link to your registered email address.

q3.question: How can I delete my account?
q3.answer: You can terminate your account from the 'Profile' section in 'Settings'. Please be aware that this action is irreversible and will delete all your data.

q1.question: How do I add a new journal entry?
q1.answer: Navigate to the 'Daily' section, select a date, and use the input field to add your entry. You can also mark entries as completed or featured.

q2.question: What are goals and how do I use them?
q2.answer: Goals help you track progress towards specific objectives. You can set a target number of entries and a deadline. Link entries to goals to track your progress.

q3.question: What kind of insights does Spark provide?
q3.answer: Spark analyzes your journaling habits to provide insights on completed entries ratio, featured entries ratio, streaks, daily activity rate, and more. These insights help you improve your journaling quality.
